overview: Each verse, as they get repeated and recited, they fulfil their destiny and later crystallise to become LILITA.AL. It is somewhat similar to how human decompose after death, but it’s more about the spirit －spirit of the syllables- that sublime and skeletonize…  A verse may forfeit its life, but the spirit returns home with the wind, and wait for destined rebirth.
title: LI.LI.TA.AL
